definition: imitation/to simulate/to imitate/analog (device, as opposed to digital)
to plan to/to draft (a plan)/to imitate/to assess/to compare/pseudo-
doubtful/suspicious/variant of 擬|拟[ni3]/to emulate/to imitate

sentences.english: Captured with black and white film, her photography emulates the style of a cinematographer.
sentences.chinese: 黑白胶片同时也模拟着舞台人生。

sentences.english: It is used for petroleum exploration and engineering tasks such as simulating aircraft designs.
sentences.chinese: 用于石油勘探和工程任务，如模拟飞机的设计。

sentences.english: Pull off a successful 4-point play with any player, in a non-simulated game.
sentences.chinese: 非模拟模式比赛，使用任意球员完成四分打。

sentences.english: Wild-simulated ginseng is planted in the fall.
sentences.chinese: 模拟野生养殖的高丽参在夏天种植。

sentences.english: To simulate the Force, technicians hid devices on "Kenobi's" person.
sentences.chinese: 为了模拟原力，技术人员在“克诺比”身上藏了仪器。

sentences.english: The expression is validated in Synopsys device simulation tools MEDICI.
sentences.chinese: 表达式用MEDICI器件模拟软件进行了验证。

sentences.english: Phenomenon of estuarine turbidity maximum zone is modeled by 2-dimensional numerical model.
sentences.chinese: 利用平面二维数值模型模拟河口最大浑浊带现象。

sentences.english: When wrist flexion simulated, the frequency of action potential waveform of median and ulnar nerve was higher.
sentences.chinese: 模拟腕屈时以正中神经和尺神经电位频率略高。

sentences.english: In this paper we consider a model simulating the ecological" phenomena in a chemostat."
sentences.chinese: 本文考察恒化器模拟生态现象的一类微观模型。

sentences.english: Design and stimulation of the OEIC receivers.
sentences.chinese: OEIC光接收机的设计和模拟。

sentences.english: Bear in mind, however, that these tests were based on simulated user workloads.
sentences.chinese: 但是请记住，这些测试是以模拟的用户负载为基础的。

sentences.english: The AD7324 can handle True Bipolar Analog input signals.
sentences.chinese: AD7324可处理真双极性模拟输入信号。

sentences.english: This phenomenon appears even more striking in the simulation realization of non-linear negative impedance.
sentences.chinese: 这在非线性负阻抗的模拟实现中，更为突出。

sentences.english: A four cone blackbody cavity was obtained by simulating the blackbody with geometric-optical method.
sentences.chinese: 用几何光学方法模拟黑体，得一四锥黑体腔。

sentences.english: The result showed that tank model surpassed conceptual model of linear reservoirs.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果显示水筒模式整体模拟均优于线性水库。

sentences.english: HCU's input and output signal is mainly analog or on-off quantity.
sentences.chinese: HCU的输入输出信号主要是模拟量和开关量。
